title: the Coming of URF Mode
body:
Prayers to the Riot Gods the day is near! Urf is coming back my brothers and sisters! BUT! The dark ones, the Evil Rioters have made whispers that they wish to condem the fabled URF Mode to the Howling Abyss! We must pray hard and hope they let is be on the Glorious Summoners Rift!
LONG LIVE SUMMONERS RIFT URF MODE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
